Once done with the previous tasks, put the bowl and spoon in the sink to be washed. Lastly, place a piece of sliced bread in a microwave.
finetuned.fintune 3: Put a chilled egg on the counter at any time. Simultaneously, slice potato and put it in the fridge with a pan. After putting the egg, move the lettuce to the refrigerator. Once done with the first tasks, put the bowl and spoon in the sink to be washed. Finally, place a piece of sliced bread in a microwave.
